'''Second Sons''' can refer to:

* [[Second Sons (mercenary company)]], a mercenary company operating in [[Essos]].
* [[Second Sons (episode)]], the [[Season 3]] episode named after the mercenary company, because it is the first episode in which the mercenary company is introduced.
